refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls rnorm function defined on R which takes n(number of values to be generated), the mean and standard deviation of normal distribution as input parameters and the result is a vector of n random numbers.

listitem.para: x : number of values to be generated
mean : the mean value of data distribution
s.d : the standard deviation of data distribution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the rnorm() function in R that takes n, mean and standard deviation of normal distribution as the input arguments and returns a vector of n random numbers.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // rnorm on n, mean and s.d y = rnorm(10,14,3)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
